name: Sacrific Run
description:
This Game is made in 2 days so their will be some bugs and sorry for that.

This game is about to free from curse. 

Don't kill blue guy ,he is a one who will free you from curse.

Take the Blue Guy to green box where the level Completed.

WASD To move

Shift to sprint

Space to Jump

Left click to shoot sword

Right click to return it

Thanks. Please comment your feedback
